post_text: October 12, 2014 at 6:00â€¯PM#1Hi,Can someone help me with this:I want to create a macro that labels another macro.But the label input havs to be a dual uservalue.something like this:setuservar $group=spotsetuservar $color=Redsetuservar $name=$groupadduservar $name= $colorlabel macro x $nameorsetuservar $group=spotsetuservar $color=Redsetuservar $name=$group $colorlabel macro x $namemy problem is when i use the adduservar function its not possible to add a space between spot and redi want to label the macro spot redthanks!
title: Label with duel name
